minions_js

This is a small boid simulation, intended to show how emergent behaviours can occur when autonomous agents are given a simple ruleset.

Minions will try to gather around their leader - the mouse pointer.

Left click to scare them away you monster

You will see that minions will try to form little packs with others to feel safe.

The background is a visualisation of the quadtree spatial partitioning algorithm used to bucket the minions for efficient collision detection.
